projects.name: BookHeaven
projects.description: Developed a Book Store website with full-stack functionality. Implemented RESTful APIs using Express.js for user authentication, book management, and order processing. Secured platform with JWT-based authentication.

projects.name: HealthHub
projects.description: Built a full-stack Hospital Management System with modules for patients, doctors, and administrators. Integrated real-time chat using Stream Chat API. Implemented doctor recommendation system and role-based access control using JWT.

achievements: Qualified GATE Exam in consecutive years 2024 and 2025
